term.title: phosphoglycerides

item.text: Phosphoric diesters, esters of phosphatidic acids, generally having a polar head group (OH or NH2) on the esterified alcohol which typically is 2-aminoethanol, choline, glycerol, inositol, serine. The term includes lecithins, cephalins. E.g. [image: Not defined]
